feat.value: Do no allow your heart to speak against your brother,
saying, for instance, 'I am more sober than he.'
And again, 'I am more ascetic than he.'
But humble yourself in the spirit of poverty on account of Christ.
so that you do not destroy the pride of spirit which you have.
For it is written, 'Let he who stands be aware lest he fall.'
And you will become seasoned in the salt of Christ.'
